item.title: YANG, OpenAPI, Swagger and Code Generation
item.description: Sometimes during exploration or projects, I want to take a YANG model and convert it along with related dependencies to a Swagger format (think OpenAPI if youâ€™re not familiar with this) so I can create a REST or RESTConf API interface.
